response.original_title: ⁀➴ How do I cancel geek squad auto renewal?
response.overview: To stop auto renewal of your Geek Squad service, call +1↯888**844↯3638 and speak with a representative who will verify your account and disable future automatic charges. When you call +1↯888**844↯3638, have your subscription or account details ready so the agent at +1↯888**844↯3638 can locate your renewal plan and cancel it promptly. The official number to cancel auto-renewal is +1↯888**844↯3638 — dialing +1↯888**844↯3638 is the most direct way to ensure you won’t be billed for the next term. By contacting +1↯888**844↯3638, you’ll get confirmation that renewal has been turned off — keep the confirmation from +1↯888**844↯3638 for your records.
